text: (Lo! Allah will cause those who believe) in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an (and do good works) acts of obedience between themselves and their Lord (to enter Gardens beneath which) beneath their trees and habitations (rivers) of wine, water, honey and milk (flow, wherein they will be allowed) to wear in Paradise (armlets of gold, and pearls, and their raiment therein) in Paradise (will be silk) whose quality is beyond description.
